oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carter Chick Show - Anniversary Program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording is the 20th anniversary for the Chick Carter Show. The tape is dated November 19, 1955. This recording features many famous country artists wishing Carter congratulations. This tape is thirty-five of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Otis Carter; John H. DeWitt; Bill Monroe; Lew Childre; Grandpa Jones; Johnny + Jack; Johnny Wright; Jack Anglin; George Morgan; Lonzo and Oscar; Lloyd George; Rolllin Sullivan; Carl Smith ; Moon Mullican; Rod Brasfield; Kitty Wells; Jimmy Dickens; Possum Hunters; Louie Buck; DeFord Bailey; Ernest Tubb; Judge Haye; Minnie Pearl; Cowboy Copas; Roy Acuff;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening of the Carter Chick Show -- (00:28) 20th year janissary show line up -- (01:00) Hank Snow introduces Otis Carter -- (01:27) I'm Moving On (Hank Snow) -- (03:14) Snow introduces John H. DeWitt -- (03:28) DeWitt addresses Carter -- (04:13) Snow announces next song -- (04:22) Rose of Old Kentucky (Bill Monroe) -- (06:36) Monroe congratulates Carter -- (06:48) -- Snow introduces Doctor Lew Childre -- (06:57) Childre addresses Carter -- (07:28) Grandpa Jones addresses Carter -- (07:56) Johnny and Jack address Carter -- (08:05) George Morgan addresses Carter -- (08:26) Snow thanks everyone and introduces Lonzo and Oscar -- (09:00) Cornbread and Lasses and Sassafras Tea (Lonzo and Oscar) -- (10:56) Oscar asks where the cake is -- (11:19) Snow introduces some more people to say congratulations to Carter -- (11:25) Carl Smith addresses Carter -- (11:54) Moon Mullican addresses Carter -- (12:15) Rod Brasfield addresses Carter -- (12:50) Kitty Wells addresses Carter -- (13:05) Ji
